str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
Simon. Of Hebrew origin; Simon, the name of nine Israelites.
Peter, a Greek name meaning rock. Apparently a primary word; a rock; as a name, Petrus, an apostle.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To nod, make a sign, beckon. Apparently a primary verb; to 'nod', i.e., signal.
To ask, inquire, ascertain by inquiry, understand.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
